allegations.description: 01.Wrongfully discourteous to an individual known to the department

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, ENGAGED IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WITH A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.
ACTED IN A MANNER LIKELY TO BE INJURIOUS TO THE PHYSICAL, MENTAL OR MORAL WELFARE OF A CHILD LESS THAN SEVENTEEN (17) YEARS OLD.
AFTER HAVING BEEN INVOLVED IN AN OFF-DUTY DOMESTIC INCIDENT, FAILED TO TIMELY NOTIFY THE OPERATIONS UNIT, AS REQUIRED.

allegations.description: 01.Wrongfully discourteous to an individual known to the Department.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY PARTICIPATED IN A PHYSICAL ALTERCATION WITH ONE (1) OR MORE OTHER PEOPLE.
WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY POSSESSED A SPRING-ASSISTED KNIFE
WHILE ON-DUTY FAILED TO PROPERLY VOUCHER AND SECURE A CELLULAR PHONE RECOVERED FROM AN ARRESTEE.
WHILE ON-DUTY, FAILED TO RENDER REASONABLE AID TO A SICK OR INJURED PERSON.
FAILED TO SUPERVISE HIS SUBORDINATES BY NOT CONDUCTING A PROPER INVESTIGATION.
FAILED TO SUPERVISE HIS SUBORDINATES BY NOT CONDUCTING A PROPER INVESTIGATION.
WORKED OVERTIME PERIODS WITHOUT PROPER AUTHORIZATION TO DO SO.
SUBMITTED OVERTIME REPORTS FOR APPROVAL FOR UNAUTHORIZED OVERTIME ACTIVITIES.

FAILED TO PROPERLY PERFORM HIS DUTIES AS DIRECTED BY COMPETENT AUTHORITY, IN THAT SAID POLICE OFFICER DID FAIL TO CONDUCT A PROPER AND THOROUGH SEARCH FOR A SPECIAL CATEGORY MISSING PERSON, IDENTITY KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT.

WHILE OFF-DUTY, HAVING WITNESSED THE ACCIDENTAL DISCHARGE OF ONE ROUND FROM A FIREARM BY ANOTHER MEMBER OF SERVICE, FAILED TO REMAIN AT THE SCENE, REQUEST THE RESPONSE OF THE PATROL SUPERVISOR, OR TO NOTIFY THE INTERNAL AFFAIRS BUREAU, AS REQUIRED.

charges.description: FAILED TO SAFEGUARD HIS OFF-DUTY FIREARM
